channel.title: [tutorail/tip] Emailing
channel.description:
here is a tut on how how to email somone without opening any windows.
step one. Paste this into your browser [code]mailto:contact@domain.co.uk?subject=omg did you know that boobs have nipples?[/code] step two. type your message and who the contact is and subject and send ;)
